prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Piano, Synth Lead, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Guitar, Piano, and a Synth Lead, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Bass, Piano, Synth Lead, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 3:
No Brass is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Bass, Guitar, Piano, and a Synth Lead.
